High Priest Gregory:
In these difficult times, it gladdens my heart to see a hot-blooded youngster such as you. I am High Priest Gregory.
As you know, Goddard is in disorder these days due to many ills. Varka Silenos and Ketra Orcs are preparing for war, and there is news Fire Dragon Valakas has awoken... These are times when the strength of young people like you are desperately needed...
And we, the apostles of light, must provide guidance and wisdom...
